Class CreateScreen

java.lang.Object
CreateScreen
public class CreateScreen extends Object
This class provides the required code to create the Air Hockey Screen.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CreateScreen()
    Constructor for CreateScreen class, creates all the screen objects required by the game.
